Freezing Point Depression.$\\Delta T_f$: Change in freezing point (units: °C or K)
Freezing Point Depression.$K_f$: Freezing point depression constant (units: °C·kg/mol or K·kg/mol)

Boiling Point Elevation.$\\Delta T_b$: Change in boiling point (units: °C or K)
Boiling Point Elevation.$K_b$: Boiling point elevation constant (units: °C·kg/mol or K·kg/mol)

Ideal Gas Law.$R$: Ideal gas constant (0.0821 L·atm/(mol·K) or 8.314 J/(mol·K))

Rydberg Equation.$n_1$: Lower energy level (principal quantum number, dimensionless)
Rydberg Equation.$n_2$: Higher energy level (principal quantum number, dimensionless)

Graham's Law.$r_1$: Rate of effusion/diffusion of gas 1 (units: mol/s or L/s)
Graham's Law.$r_2$: Rate of effusion/diffusion of gas 2 (units: mol/s or L/s)

Arrhenius Equation.$k$: Rate constant (units vary with reaction order)
Arrhenius Equation.$A$: Pre-exponential factor or frequency factor (units same as k)
